sen.j: 日置雄三成（へきのおみなり、生没年不明)は奈良時代の官人。
sen.e: Ominari HEKINO (date of birth and death unknown) was a government official (lower or middle ranked) in the Nara Period.
Ominari HEKINO (date of birth and death unknown) was a government official (lower or middle ranked) in the Nara Period.
Ominari HEKINO (date of birth and death unknown) was a government official (lower or middle ranked) in the Nara Period.
Later, he took the name of Ominari TORII.
Later, he took the name of Ominari TORII.

sen.j: 宝亀8年に鳥井宿禰を賜ったという。
sen.e: In 777, he was conferred Torii Sukune (third highest of the eight hereditary titles).
In 777, he was conferred Torii Sukune (third highest of the eight hereditary titles).
